title: Admin nurse management and demo staff seeding UI

requirements.summary: Add an Admin Dashboard panel to list and add nurses, analogous to Manage Doctors, including React Query hooks.
acceptanceCriteria: A new admin panel exists for managing nurses with a table listing nurse name, department, and principal ID (formatted similar to doctors/patients).
The nurses panel provides an “Add Nurse” dialog with inputs for full name, department, and principal ID, validates required fields, and shows success/error toasts.
Admin Dashboard tabs include a Nurses/Staff tab (or equivalent) that renders the nurses management panel.
Frontend adds React Query hooks for getNurses/addNurse (matching existing useGetDoctors/useAddDoctor patterns) and invalidates nurse queries on mutation success.

file_operations.description: Add React Query hooks for nurses: useGetNurses (query key like ['nurses']) and useAddNurse (mutation calling the backend capability to add a nurse and invalidating the nurses query on success). Ensure the Nurse type is imported from the generated backend types. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Create a new ManageNursesPanel modeled after ManageDoctorsPanel: fetch nurses via useGetNurses; render a table with Name, Department, Principal ID (truncate/monospace consistent with other panels); include an “Add Nurse” dialog using existing shadcn/ui components (Card, Button, Dialog, Input, Label, Table) with required-field validation, Principal parsing, loading state, and success/error toasts. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Integrate the nurses management panel into the Admin Dashboard Tabs: add a Nurses/Staff tab trigger and a corresponding TabsContent rendering ManageNursesPanel; adjust the TabsList grid columns accordingly; ensure user-facing text is English. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Add an admin dashboard control to trigger demo staff seeding and refresh doctors/nurses lists after success.
acceptanceCriteria: Admin Dashboard includes a clearly labeled action (e.g., button) to run the backend demo staff seeding method.
Clicking the action shows loading state and a success/error toast.
After successful seeding, the doctors list and nurses list refresh automatically (React Query invalidation/refetch).

file_operations.description: Add a React Query mutation hook (e.g., useSeedDemoStaff) that calls the backend demo staff seeding capability (align the called method name with the backend implementation) and on success invalidates/refetches both ['doctors'] and ['nurses'] queries (and any relevant dashboard stats queries if desired for immediate UI consistency). Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Add a clearly labeled admin action (e.g., a button near the dashboard header) that triggers the demo staff seeding mutation: show pending/loading state, and display success/error toasts; on success rely on the mutation hook invalidations to refresh doctors and nurses lists automatically. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
